chain.description:
The task requires obtaining the rich menu ID linked to a specific user and downloading an image associated with a given rich menu ID. I will start by retrieving the rich menu ID linked to the user with ID '12345'.

Next step: Call `get_rich_menu_id_of_user_for_line_messaging` with the provided user ID.

As I cannot proceed without proper access, I will restart the task and attempt to proceed with downloading the image associated with the rich menu having the ID '67890', since that component of the task might still be feasible.

Next step: Attempt to download the image for the rich menu with ID '67890'.

chain.description:
It appears that the authorization issue affects all API interactions, not just the initial request. Without the ability to resolve the authorization error or access necessary data, I cannot efficiently execute the task.

I will proceed to restart the task formally.

To get the ID of the rich menu linked to the specified user and download an associated image with another rich menu ID, I will start by fetching the rich menu ID for the user with ID '12345'.

chain.description:
It appears that the request to get the rich menu ID failed due to missing authorization. Since direct handling of authorization keys and tokens may not be supported in my current setup, I will proceed to the second part of the task by attempting to download the rich menu image for the rich menu ID '67890'.

Next step: Call the function to download the image for the rich menu with ID '67890'.

chain.observation: {"error": "", "response": "{'message': \"Authorization header required. Must follow the scheme, 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS TOKEN>'\"}"}

chain.description:
The attempt to download the image also faced the same authorization issue as the previous request. Unfortunately, without access to manage authorization directly, I cannot proceed with retrieving the rich menu ID or downloading the image.

Since I am unable to handle these queries under the current conditions, I will restart the task.

Final step: Call the "Finish" function with the decision to restart.

We first need to get the ID of the rich menu connected to the user with ID '12345' to address the first part of the request.

Next, I will call the function to get the rich menu ID for the given user.

chain.description:
There was an error regarding authorization when trying to fetch the rich menu ID. Unfortunately, without the proper authorization or access token, I cannot proceed with accessing the rich menu ID or downloading the image associated with another ID directly.

Given the situation, we'll need to reset the process as we can't complete either of the user's requests without proper authorization. I will now restart this task.

function.name: get_content_for_line_messaging
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "line_messaging", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Gets image, video, and audio data sent by users."

function.name: get_rich_menu_id_of_user_for_line_messaging
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "line_messaging", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Gets the ID of the rich menu linked to a user."

userid.description: User ID. Found in the source object of webhook event objects. Do not use the LINE ID used in LINE.

function.name: download_rich_menu_image_for_line_messaging
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "line_messaging", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Downloads an image associated with a rich menu."

richmenuid.description: ID of the rich menu with the image to be downloaded

function.name: get_rich_menu_list_for_line_messaging
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "line_messaging", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Gets a list of all uploaded rich menus."

function.name: get_rich_menu_for_line_messaging
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "line_messaging", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Gets a rich menu via a rich menu ID."

richmenuid.description: ID of an uploaded rich menu

function.name: get_profile_for_line_messaging
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "line_messaging", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Gets user profile information."

userid.description: User ID that is returned in a webhook event object. Do not use the LINE ID found on LINE.

function.name: get_default_rich_menu_id_for_line_messaging
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "line_messaging", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Gets the ID of the default rich menu set with the Messaging API."

function.name: get_number_of_sent_reply_messages_for_line_messaging
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "line_messaging", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Gets the number of messages sent with the /bot/message/reply endpoint."

date.description: Date the messages were sent. Format: yyyyMMdd (Example: 20191231) Timezone: UTC+9

function.name: get_qaq_for_qaq
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "qaq", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Conditionally requests user for an input, and returns their input or a predefined message stating no user input is required for answering the query."

requires_input.description: A flag to determine if user input is needed (1) or not (0)

input_question.description: The question to ask the user to gather more information for answering the query

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: Could you please provide me with the ID of the rich menu linked to the user with the ID '12345'? Furthermore, I would like to download the image associated with the rich menu having the ID '67890'.
